amendment.description: Amendment requires the President to report to Congress concerning the targeting or re-targeting of Russian Intercontinental Ballistic Missiles at sites in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the President to certify to certify whether it is possible to verify that no Russian Intercontinental Ballistic Missiles aimed at the United States, certify the length of time required to retarget ICBMs, and certify whether a missil would automatically be retargeted in the event of an accidental launch.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (PA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 290 - 100 (Roll no. 223).
